channel.title: Ben Cochrane on Ben's Footy Rants
channel.description: Recent content in Ben Cochrane on Ben's Footy Rants

item.title: The ðŸ…±ump
item.description: Bans for tackles and bumps are the talk of the town, causing outrage from fantasy football coaches and old bogans alike. I have created a Dataset of AFL Bans (DAB) for use in analysis. From Round 1 to Round 6 we have seen 18 players banned for offences ranging from bumps, strikes to tackles. The majority of bans coming from tackles and bumps, with a minority from strikes Clustering of midfielders, looking like strong correlation between number of tackles and potential to be banned for tackling.

item.title: About
item.description: I am an idiot who likes to write make silly little charts about footy. I hope you can enjoy them as much as I enjoy making them. Hopefully I’ll upload some of my old footy emails here when I have time. Sorry some of them are very cursed. One of the silly little charts even made it on the Alan Kohler’s Finance report.
